name: Sinestra
text:
Revenge is a dish best served cold.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: High King
text:
Bring this to ME!

Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, March 2026.

name: Tsulong
text:
Protect what you hold sacred.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: Golden Dragon
text:
Show them the dragon's fury.

Obtained by participating in a special event.
